text.div:
NamingSystemType

Identifies the purpose of the naming system

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/namingsystem-type, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
codesystem Code SystemThe naming system is used to define concepts and symbols to represent those concepts; e.g. UCUM, LOINC, NDC code, local lab codes, etc.
identifier IdentifierThe naming system is used to manage identifiers (e.g. license numbers, order numbers, etc.)
root RootThe naming system is used as the root for other identifiers and naming systems

name: NamingSystemType
description: Identifies the purpose of the naming system

concept.definition: The naming system is used to define concepts and symbols to represent those concepts; e.g. UCUM, LOINC, NDC code, local lab codes, etc.
The naming system is used to manage identifiers (e.g. license numbers, order numbers, etc.)
The naming system is used as the root for other identifiers and naming systems
